data.comment: The first-half is under way at Kehrweg Stadium - Eupen kick-off to start the match.
Michael Frey puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
In the minute 15, Eupen make their first substitution with Edo Kayembe replacing Jens Cools.
Waasland-Beveren have kicked-off the second half at Kehrweg Stadium.
In the minute 58, Benat San Jose Gil is making the team's second substitution at Kehrweg Stadium with Amara Baby replacing Mamadou Kone.
Stef Peeters (Eupen) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Menno Koch.
In the minute 84, The home team have replaced Knowledge Musona with Konan N'Dri. This is the third substitution made today by Benat San Jose Gil.
Andrija Vukcevic for Waasland-Beveren has been booked by Lothar D Hondt and receives a first yellow card.
The second-half is over. The match ends 1-1.
Nicky Hayen (Waasland-Beveren) is making a first substitution, with Aboubakary Koita replacing Danel Sinani.
The away team replace Georges Mandjeck with Daan Heymans.
At Kehrweg Stadium, Aleksandar Vukotic has been yellow-carded for the away team.
